node.detail_zh: 患者為印尼籍外傭，無外遊記錄，8 月 2 日出現症狀。患者在舊合約完結後，於 7 月 16 至 23 日替朋友於筲箕灣照顧一名長者，7 月 23 日到 8 月 3 日暫住於旺角長旺道 15 號長興大廈 9 樓一宿舍。8 月 3 日開始新工作，於大角咀負責照顧兩名長者。
node.detail_en: The patient is an Indonesian domestic helper, has no recent travel history and developed symptoms on August 2. After her previous contract, she helped took care of an elderly individual in Shau Kei Wan for her friend between July 16 and 23. Between July 23 and Aug 3, she stayed temporarily in a dormitory/boarding house on the 9th floor of Cheong Hing Mansion, 15 Cheong Wong Road, Mong Kok. On Aug 3, she started her new job taking caring of two elderly individuals in Tai Kok Tsui.

groups.name_zh: 長興大廈 2 樓及 9 樓外傭宿舍
groups.name_en: Cheong Hing Mansion Boarding Houses for Domestic Helpers
groups.description_zh: 屬同一負責人位於長興大廈 2 樓及 9 樓的宿舍，有曾入住印傭及負責人的家人先後確診。
groups.description_en: The two boarding houses for domestic helpers on 2/F and 9/F, Cheong Hing Mansion are both managed by the same person. Confirmed cases include Indonesian domestic helpers who resided there and family members of the boarding houses manager.

node.location_en: Tai Kok Tsui Municipal Services Building
